/*main.cæ–‡ä»¶*/
#include<stdio.h>

{

/*main.c*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include"sub_add.h"
#include"unsgn_pow.h"
int main()
{
  int x,y;
  printf("Please input two int numbers:\n");
  scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
  printf("x+y=%d,x-y=%d\n",add(x,y),sub(x,y));
  printf("x^y=%llu\n",unsgn_pow(x,y));
  return 0;
}

/sub_add.c/
/*x+y*/
int sub(int x,int y)
{
  return x-y;
}

/*x-y*/
int add(int x,int y)
{
  return x+y;
}

/*unsgn_pow.c*/
/*ç”¨é€’å½’æ±‚x^y*/
unsigned long long unsgn_pow(int x,int y)
{
  unsigned long long res=1;
  if(0==y)
    res=1;
  else if(1==y)
    res=x;
  else
    res=x*unsgn_pow(x,y-1);

  return res;
}

includeæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹é‡Œçš„æ–‡ä»¶

/*unsgn_pow.h*/

qDebug()<<time;
int time2 = current_time.toTime_t();
